Package edu.gordon.physical

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CardReaderInterface
    Created by Iron_Cesar on 16-01-27.
    CashDispenserInterface
    Created by Iron_Cesar on 16-01-27.
    CustomerConsoleInterface
    Created by Iron_Cesar on 16-01-27.

    Created by Iron_Cesar on 16-01-27.
    NetworkToBankInterface
    Interface
    OperatorPanelInterface  
    ReceiptPrinterInterface  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ATM
    Representation for the ATM itself.
    ATMMain
    Main program class for the application version of the ATM edu.gordon.simulation.
    CardReaderSimulation
    Manager for the ATM's card reader.
    CashDispenser
    Manager for the ATM's cash dispenser.
    CustomerConsoleSimulation
    Manager for the ATM's customer console.
    Deposit
    Representation for a deposit transaction
    EnvelopeAcceptorSimulation
    Manager for the ATM's envelope acceptor.
    Inquiry
    Representation for a balance inquiry transaction
    Log
    Manager for the ATM's internal log.
    NetworkToBankSimulation
    Manager for the ATM's network connection.
    OperatorPanelSimulation
    Manager for the ATM's operator panel.
    Receipt
    Abstract base class for representation of a receipt to be printed.
    ReceiptPrinterSimulation
    Manager for the ATM's receipt printer.
    Session
    Representation for one ATM session serving a single customer.
    Simulation
    Simulation of the physical components of the ATM, including its network connection to the bank.
    Transaction
    Abstract base class for classes representing the various kinds of transaction the ATM can perform
    Transfer
    Representation for a transfer transaction
    Withdrawal
    Representation for a cash withdrawal transaction
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Transaction.CardRetained
    exception that is thrown when the customer's card is retained due to too many invalid PIN entries
